problem.markdown:
>>Will a SDOF system with a shorter height oscillate faster, slower, or the same? Try it by shortening the height or length of the dowel or piece of spaghetti.<< (x) faster ( ) slower ( ) same
[explanation] As you decrease the height of the column/SDOF system you increase the stiffness and cause the system to oscillate at a faster rate. The frequency, or rate of oscillation, increases. [explanation]
problem.p: Will a SDOF system with a shorter height oscillate faster, slower, or the same? Try it by shortening the height or length of the dowel or piece of spaghetti.

choicegroup.label: Will a SDOF system with a shorter height oscillate faster, slower, or the same? Try it by shortening the height or length of the dowel or piece of spaghetti.

div.p: As you decrease the height of the column/SDOF system you increase the stiffness and cause the system to oscillate at a faster rate. The frequency, or rate of oscillation, increases.
